original_title: Untold Blessing Three Paths to Holiness
overview: Father Robert Barron paints a beautiful and mysterious image of what it takes to be a follower of, the One who is, Jesus Christ. He lays out three intriguing paths to holiness: Finding the Center; Knowing You're A Sinner; and Realizing Your Life is Not About You.
title: Untold Blessing Three Paths to Holiness
